trans-unit.source: Signals to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" />，告知其不应该生成任何更多的消息也不应使用任何更多的延迟消息。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Complete%2A> has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A> task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Complete%2A>已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A>任务将进入最终状态之后它已处理所有以前可用的数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Complete%2A> will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A> task may be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Complete%2A> 将不会阻止等待完成发生，而是将发起的请求; 但要等待的时间完成，发生，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A>可能使用任务。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" /> that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task" />，其表示数据流块的操作和完成。

trans-unit.source: A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages.
trans-unit.target: 数据流块视为已完成时它当前不在处理一条消息，当它具有保证不会处理更多消息。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task> will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task>关联的块完成时将转换为已完成状态。

trans-unit.source: It will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion> state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics.
trans-unit.target: 它将转换为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.RanToCompletion>状态在阻塞完成其处理成功根据数据流块时定义的语义。

trans-unit.source: It will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request.
trans-unit.target: 它将转换为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>状态在数据流块已完成处理过早地由于未经处理的异常，并且它将转换为<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus><xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>时数据流块已完成的状态由于正在接收取消请求过早地处理。

trans-unit.source: If the task completes in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted> state, its `Exception` property will return an <xref:System.AggregateException> containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务在完成时处于<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted>状态，其`Exception`属性将返回<xref:System.AggregateException>包含导致失败的块的一个或多个异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the faulting.
Causes the <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> to complete in a <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 导致 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock" /> 在 <see cref="F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Faulted" /> 状态下完成。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault%2A> has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A> task will enter a final state.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault%2A>已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Completion%2A>任务将进入最终状态。

trans-unit.source: Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.
trans-unit.target: 出错块，作为与取消块，导致缓冲的消息 （未处理的输入的消息，以及 unoffered 的输出消息） 会丢失。
